data.current_description: Get the list of blog authors. Supports paging and filtering. This method would be useful for an integration that examined these models and used an external service to suggest edits.

Accepts 11 query parameters for pagination (limit, offset), filtering, and sorting options. Returns a collection of Blog Author objects with pagination metadata. Useful for retrieving subsets of authors for review, analysis, or integration with external services.

Accepts a BlogAuthorCloneRequestVNext object specifying the source author ID, target language, and any localized content overrides. The new author is linked to the original author's multi-language group, enabling synchronized management across language versions.
